section.title: Insert metadata during launch
section.para: When booting a server, you can also add metadata, so that you can more easily identify it amongst your ever-growing elastic cloud. Use the --meta option with a key=value pair, where you can make up the string for both the key and the value. For example, you could add a description and also the creator of the server. $ nova boot --image natty-image --flavor 2 smallimage2 --meta description 'Small test image' --meta creator=joecool
